column4: I need help port forwarding with Apache on Ubuntu.  Right now, when I enter my domain name, it takes me to the router page.  I can enter the computer's IP Address and it will show me the website.  I know I need to forward the ports.  How do I do that?
the website works on my internal network when i type in the ip address
ok... but what do i do on the admin page?
also you're isp might block port 80 as their fair use rules typically rule out the running of servers.
